import React, { useState } from 'react'; const SpeedBox = ({ speedData }) => { const [currentBall, setCurrentBall] = useState({ over: '5', speed: '132kmph' }); return (
{/* Semi-transparent backdrop */}
{/* Speed display */}
{/* Speed Icon with Animation */} {speedData?.Over || currentBall.over} - {speedData?.Ball_Speed || currentBall.speed}
); }; export default SpeedBox;
